title: To the people spending Christmas playing League...
body:
Whether you've been disowned, are a Rioter working a long shift, are a miserable lonely person, are spending the day gaming with friends or SO(s), have lost your family, have run away, don't live in a caring home, and are spending Christmas playing League...

Merry Christmas! Happy holidays! 

Have a joyous time and I wish you get no inting Yasuos or trolling Teemos. I hope the games are fun and you have an amazing time, win or lose! (Also remember to stay hydrated and get up and move every so often). 

{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

replies.body:
> Also remember to stay hydrated and get up and move every so often

This. I always suggest my friends in game to do this

And Merry Christmas to you too

As fun as playing Janna support doing more damage then your top, mid and jungle. Oh and your top + mid lanes flaming each other in champ select then in early game. No matter how hard I try I'm just paired with potatoes.
It part of the grind. I live it too. Merry xmas.
Well it all worked out anyway I made a come back and in promo's for S1 now (for the 5th time in a row) :D
I got 14 day banned on Christmas. Riot is a dog company.
